factContent: This entire website has been coded in Polymer, by Google. That's pretty cool.
Jamie has played tuba for thirteen years. Weird, I know.
Jamie once wrote an entire 10-minute long song using just a music sample of a door closing. You can listen to it here
Jamie is well versed in the visual coding language Max by Cycling 74. He often uses it to compose generative music!
Jamie is the youngest of four kids
Regardless of this epic photo of Jamie, he can't actually surf.
Jamie can not only play electric bass guitar, he can also play stand up! What a stand up guy.
Jamie has worked on several film sets as a boom op and mixer.

factTitle: Right in the Meaty Part of the Bell Curve
factContent: Jamie has completed the Grouse Grind in just under and hour. Impressed yet?
Jamie and this dinosaur skeleton have the same smile.
Jamie is an avid Ultimate Frisbee player. He also participates in Soccer.
Jamie loves to ski, he even owns a Whistler Blackcomb season pass.
Jamie has been to China... twice!

factTitle: Maybe the Flames Will Win This Year.
factContent: Jamie was born and raised in Calgary Alberta
